OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord progression-free time ( 6-12 month v 12 month ) , type prior first-line therapy , bidimensionally measurable disease ( yes v ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive carboplatin IV 30-60 minute day 1 gemcitabine IV 30-60 minute day 1 8 . - Arm II : Patients receive carboplatin IV arm I . Treatment arm repeat every 3 week 6-8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , subsequent chemotherapy course , 50 day study .
